abstract.text: A request to transfer money to facilitate payment of a bill.

inlineContent.text: object when the user asks to pay a bill for a designated payee. A pay bill intent object includes the payment amount, the payment date, and the recipient of the payment. Use that information to validate the transaction and to schedule the payment.
To handle this intent, the handler object in your Intents extension must adopt the
protocol. Your handler should confirm the request and create an
object with the results of scheduling the bill payment.

This intent object represents a financial transaction between the user and an entity (such as a utility company or credit card bill) defined in your app. You’re responsible for configuring and managing the entities that accept the payment of bills.
The following table lists additional attributes of this intent object:
Siri Intents, Siri Suggestions, Shortcuts app.

When performing a search, Siri automatically asks the user to unlock a currently locked device. You don’t need to explicitly ask to unlock the device. In addition, Siri always prompts the user to confirm the request before asking your Intents extension to handle it.

Users can ask Siri to initiate the payment of a bill in a variety of ways. The table below provides a few sample phrases in different languages. You can use these phrases during testing to trigger your intents. This list isn’t exhaustive and Siri may recognize many other phrases.
Pay my gas bill on November 21st
在十一月二十一日付我的煤气账单
喺十月九號俾水費賬單
喺十月九号俾水费账单
Betal min gasregning på den 21 november
Zahle meine Gas Rechnung am 21. November
Pagar mi factura del gas el 21 de Noviembre
Payer ma facture de gaz le 21 novembre
תשלמי את חשבון הגז שלי ב-21 לנובמבר
paga il conto del gas il 21 di Novembre
11月21日にガスの請求書を払って
Bayar bil gas saya pada 21 November
Pagar minha conta de luz dia 21 de novembro
จ่ายบิลค่าน้ำ
วันที่ 21 พฤศจิกายน จ่ายค่าน้ำ
Su faturasını öde Elektrik faturasını öde

abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.
A request to fulfill in your app or Intents extension.
A request to transfer money to facilitate payment of a bill.
The recipient of the payment.
The type of the bill.
The due date of the payment.
The user account containing the funds for the payment.
Initializes the bill pay intent object with the specified payee and transaction details.
The amount to transfer from the user to the payee.
A note to associate with the payment transaction.
The scheduled date for the payment, as requested by the user.
The handler interface for paying a bill using money from the user’s account.
Your app’s response to a request to pay a bill.
An object for registering user-specific vocabulary that Siri requests might include.
A protocol that enables an object to be encoded and decoded for archiving and distribution.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A protocol that enables encoding and decoding in a manner that is robust against object substitution attacks.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
